title: lEvE shankaraputra
sahitya:
lEvE shankaraputra lEvE shankaragAtra televAranayyA divya tEjA vighna rAjA


caraNam 1    vEda ghOSalatODa vibhudALi vinutimpa vEciyunnArayya vighnEshvarA siddhIshvarA
    caraNam 2    modaTi pUjalu nIku mudamAra sEyakA mOdaka priya nIku mrokkEmayA buddhIshvarA
    caraNam 3    AyurAg rOgyAdi aishvaryamulanimmu Anandatara muraLI nAdamaya dEvA vinOdamaya bhAvA
